comments.body:
Looks good (as do the other props)

https://github.com/JedWatson/react-select/blob/v3.0.0/packages/react-select/src/components/MultiValue.js#L48

I notice we use `data: OptionType` throughout (while `data: any` seems to be used in react-select)

I assume that's okay and just additional typesafety for us üëç
